sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Bed, Activity, Users, Zap, TrendingUp, AlertTriangle } from 'lucide-react'; const mockResources = { beds: { total: 150, available: 45, occupied: 95, cleaning: 10, utilization: 63 }, staff: { doctors: { total: 35, available: 28, onDuty: 25 }, nurses: { total: 80, available: 65, onDuty: 70 }, technicians: { total: 25, available: 20, onDuty: 22 } }, equipment: [ { name: 'Ventilators', total: 20, available: 8, inUse: 12, maintenance: 0 }, { name: 'Patient Monitors', total: 50, available: 15, inUse: 33, maintenance: 2 }, { name: 'Defibrillators', total: 15, available: 12, inUse: 3, maintenance: 0 }, { name: 'Infusion Pumps', total: 40, available: 10, inUse: 28, maintenance: 2 } ] }; export function ResourceDashboard() { return (

Resource Allocation Dashboard

Real-time monitoring of hospital resources and capacity

Bed Capacity

{mockResources.beds.total}
Total Beds
{mockResources.beds.available}
Available
{mockResources.beds.occupied}
Occupied
{mockResources.beds.cleaning}
Cleaning
Overall Utilization {mockResources.beds.utilization}%

Staff Availability

{Object.entries(mockResources.staff).map(([role, data]) => (

{role}

Total {data.total}
On Duty {data.onDuty}
Available {data.available}
))}

Equipment Status

{mockResources.equipment.map((item) => { const utilization = Math.round((item.inUse / item.total) * 100); return ( ); })}
Equipment Total Available In Use Maintenance Utilization
{item.name} {item.total} {item.available} {item.inUse} {item.maintenance}
{utilization}%

Capacity Forecast

Next 4 Hours
+15% Load
Expected increase
Peak Time
2:00 PM
Prepare resources
Recommendation
+5 Staff
For optimal coverage
); }
